implementation.useCase: Gamma integrated Claude to power their AI-driven presentation generation features, particularly for creating presentations from scratch and iterating on slide content and design. Claude helps users generate presentations with better quality output and more appropriate tone.
implementation.problem: Gamma's initial LLM choices performed well on simple tasks but struggled with advanced concepts like turning long documents into presentations. User feedback on advanced use cases was only 50% positive, which the team considered unsatisfactory. They also faced concerns about costs as they scaled after a viral launch.

metrics.metric: improvement in user satisfaction for advanced use cases
metrics.sourceText: In fact, positive feedback for advanced use cases increased 30%.

metrics.metric: increase in conversions from free to paid
metrics.sourceText: Based on the positive outcome of the A/B test, Gamma quickly shipped the new version of their app to production—and that initial 30% improvement in user satisfaction has driven a 20% increase in conversions from free to paid.
Though they consider themselves an AI-native company, they no longer feel sharp pressure to aggressively hire AI specialists onto their 16-person team, which supports 17 million users.

metrics.metric: of Gamma's AI features powered by Claude
metrics.sourceText: Today, Claude powers well over half of Gamma's AI features.

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Improved tone and voice in presentations
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Users appreciated Claude's more neutral tone compared to the previous LLM's 'very salesy' tone
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Gamma users responded particularly well to Claude's voice and tone. 'People had been frustrated that the tone of all of these presentations sounded the same,' Jon says, adding that the previous LLM's tone was 'very salesy.' Users appreciated Claude's more neutral tone and ability to adapt to different audiences.

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Better performance on advanced use cases
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude exceeded their previous LLM on output quality while being more cost-effective
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: 'In our evaluations, Claude 3 Haiku exceeded our previous LLM on output quality, in spite of being significantly more cost-effective for our business.' Jon says. 'I had expected similar quality for lower cost, but Claude 3 Haiku exceeded our expectations.'

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Reduced need for specialized AI talent
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Gamma didn't need to build a large AI team due to Claude's capabilities
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: 'One benefit of models like Claude being so good is that we haven't had to build a huge team around AI,' Jon says. 'We've been able to focus more on productizing the experience versus training our own models or even fine-tuning them, because there's already so much we can do.'

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude provided better quality at a more cost-effective price point
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: The team was initially drawn to Claude for its state of the art performance and cost-effective price point, which had become a concern as the company's viral growth continued to scale.

outcomes.timeToValue: Quick value realization after A/B testing
outcomes.roi: Lower costs while improving performance and conversion rates

technicalDetails.challenges: Previous LLMs struggled with advanced concepts like turning long documents into presentations, with only 50% positive feedback
technicalDetails.solutions: Implemented Claude 3 Haiku after A/B testing against their existing solution
